TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Vungalid, title = Vungalid, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vungalid} }

S.FORM: Vungalid Itiniay i Laiyi Cen no Pingtung ko Vungalid a niyaro', 304 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,067 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 1,032 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 35 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan94%, roma2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Vongalid Itiniay i Laiyi Cen no Pingtong ko Vongalid a niyaro', 304 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,067 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 1,032 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 35 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan94%, roma2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
